text: Fox Cable Networks is an American entertainment industry company that operates through four segments, mainly filmed entertainment, television stations, television broadcast networks, and cable network programming. The company is wholly owned and controlled by the American media conglomerate 21st Century Fox, which is chaired and part owned by the Australian-American Rupert Murdoch, since the company acquired all the stock of Fox. The company was launched in 1996. Category:1996 establishments in the United States Category:American entertainment companies
title: Fox Cable Networks
